statement.title: Problem Description
statement.content: wr recently learned the Euclidean algorithm to solve the greatest common divisor,then  he realized that the algorithm can also be able to solve the least common multiple.In order to train the skill of code,he find a number p(1<=p<=2^25)and a number q(1<=q<=2^25) then he got n=p*q,he  calculated a<sub>1</sub>=∑gcd(i, n) 1<=i <=n and a<sub>2</sub>= ∑lcm(i, n) 1<=i <=n,he wants to know if a2-a1 is the multiple of c(1<=c<=10^9)

statement.title: Input
statement.content:
The first line contains the number of scenarios.
Every scenario consists of a single line containing two integers n and c separated by a space.

statement.title: Output
statement.content:
for every scenario print a single line contain "yes" or "no"
if the difference is the multiple of c print "yes",otherwise print "no"

statement.title: Source
statement.content: 2011 Multi-University Training Contest 4 - Host by SDU
